simplesect.para: A vector representation of a 1024-bit unsigned integer as two 512-bit fields.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para:
A union of:
homogeneous aggregate of 1024-bit unsigned integer.
struct of:
two x homogeneous aggregate of 512-bit unsigned integers.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Useful for summing partial products based on a 512x512-bit multiply.
